Class AccountController

java.lang.Object
  com.aionemu.loginserver.controller.AccountController

public class AccountController
extends java.lang.Object

This class is resposible for controlling all account actions

Author:
KID, SoulKeeper

login

public static AionAuthResponse login(java.lang.String name,
                                     java.lang.String password,
                                     AionConnection connection)
Tries to authentificate account.
If success returns AionAuthResponse.AUTHED and sets account object to connection.
If Config.ACCOUNT_AUTO_CREATION is enabled - creates new account.

Parameters:
name - name of account
password - password of account
connection - connection for account
Returns:
Response with error code

kickAccount

public static void kickAccount(int accountId)
Kicks account from LoginServer and GameServers

Parameters:
accountId - account ID to kick

loadAccount

public static Account loadAccount(java.lang.String name)
Loads account from DB and returns it, or returns null if account was not loaded

Parameters:
name - acccount name
Returns:
loaded account or null

createAccount

public static Account createAccount(java.lang.String name,
                                    java.lang.String password)
Creates new account and stores it in DB. Returns account object in case of success or null if failed

Parameters:
name - account name
password - account password
Returns:
account object or null
